mapper.select: select count(*) from maga where state = '1'
select * from (select rownum rnum, ma.* from (select * from maga where state='1' order by maga_num desc) ma) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.update: update maga set readcount = readcount + 1 where maga_num = #{maga_num}
update maga set state = '0' where maga_num = #{maga_num}
update maga set recom = recom + 1 where maga_num = #{maga_num}
